name: cello
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a wooden musical instrument with four strings, that is held vertically between the legs and is played by moving a bow across the strings: My girlfriend plays the cello.
kamil/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe played cello as a teen in the school orchestra.My daughter is taking up the cello.Their albums feature instruments from cello and pedal steel guitar to harmonica. Jacqueline du Pré's recordings of the Cello Concerto

a large, wooden musical instrument with four strings which a player rests on the floor, holding it between the legs while sitting, and plays with a bow (= stick with hairs attached to it), or this type of instrument generally cellist noun [ C ] us

a cellist with the Chicago Symphony
